/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Power lines stretch across the sky, a common sight in many cityscapes. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene.
